thread.title: WATCH: Obama Goon Can’t Answer Simple Wiretapping Question
thread.title_full: WATCH: Obama Goon Can’t Answer Simple Wiretapping Question

author: K. Campbell
title: WATCH: Obama Goon Can’t Answer Simple Wiretapping Question
text:
Obama Gang’s Denial of Wiretapping Is Manipulation of Words 
When the former press secretary dodged the question, Raddatz asked him again, but he never gave a definitive answer. 
“Here’s the simple answer to that question, Martha,” Earnest said. “I don’t know, and it’s not because I’m no longer in government.” 
He contended that even when he was “in government,” he was not in a position that required him to be “regularly briefed on an FBI criminal or counterintelligence investigation.” Advertisement - story continues below 
Watch Earnest’s comments here: 
In other words, when Earnest first claimed that the Obama White House did not order the wiretap, he was only saying that to protect his former boss — not because he knew for sure that what he was saying was true. 
That, plus the fact that he continually dodged questions about the situation was further evidence that an investigation into the situation has become imperative. Advertisement - story continues below
